verses.text: Moreover Elihu \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w ye|strong="H3045"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w*; \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H3045"\w*, \w ye|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ear trieth \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w palate|strong="H2441"\w* \w tasteth|strong="H2938"\w* meat.

Let \w us|strong="H3045"\w* choose \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*: let \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* among ourselves \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* Job \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* God \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*:

Notwithstanding \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \add accounted \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w liar|strong="H3576"\w*; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w wound|strong="H2671"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* incurable, \add though I am \add*\w without|strong="H1097"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w like|strong="H3933"\w* Job, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w drinketh|strong="H8354"\w* \w up|strong="H8354"\w* \w scorning|strong="H3933"\w* \w like|strong="H3933"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

Which \w goeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w company|strong="H2274"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H7562"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w walketh|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7562"\w* men.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w profiteth|strong="H5532"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w himself|strong="H7521"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H2486"\w*, \w ye|strong="H8085"\w* men \w of|strong="H3824"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w*: \w far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H3824"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* God, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* should \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*; \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* should commit \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w of|strong="H6467"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man shall \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w render|strong="H7999"\w* \w unto|strong="H7999"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H4672"\w* cause \w every|strong="H3588"\w* man \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* according \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* ways.

Yea, \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* surety, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H7561"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth? \w or|strong="H4310"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w disposed|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w*?

\w If|strong="H7760"\w* \w he|strong="H7760"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* \w man|strong="H3820"\w*, \add if \add*\w he|strong="H7760"\w* gather \w unto|strong="H7760"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*;

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w perish|strong="H1478"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

If \w now|strong="H8085"\w* \add thou hast \add*\w understanding|strong="H8085"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*: \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H6662"\w* even \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w that|strong="H6662"\w* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w govern|strong="H2280"\w*? \w and|strong="H4941"\w* wilt thou \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w that|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add and \add*\w mighty|strong="H3524"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H7563"\w* it \add fit \add*\w to|strong="H4428"\w* say \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \add Thou art \add*vile? \add or \add*\w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w*, \add Ye are \add*\w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*?

\add How much less to \add*\w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* respecteth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w regardeth|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rich|strong="H7771"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w In|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w midnight|strong="H2676"\w*; \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w shaken|strong="H1607"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* mighty \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w goings|strong="H6806"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w no|strong="H6466"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, nor \w shadow|strong="H6757"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* iniquity may \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5641"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* needeth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w further|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w consider|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* breaketh \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7489"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w* \w men|strong="H3524"\w* \add in ways \add*past finding \w out|strong="H2714"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w setteth|strong="H5975"\w* others \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H8478"\w* \w stead|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* taketh \w knowledge|strong="H5234"\w* \w of|strong="H5234"\w* \w their|strong="H2015"\w* \w works|strong="H4566"\w*; \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w overturneth|strong="H2015"\w* \w them|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H3915"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2015"\w*.

\w He|strong="H8478"\w* \w striketh|strong="H5606"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w in|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w open|strong="H4725"\w* \w sight|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* others;

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w following|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w would|strong="H5493"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7919"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*:

\w So|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* caused \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* come \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* giveth \w quietness|strong="H8252"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* then \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*? \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w hideth|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* then \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w behold|strong="H7789"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*? whether \add it be done \add*\w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w or|strong="H1471"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w*, \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*:

\w That|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w man|strong="H2611"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* there \w be|strong="H5971"\w* none \w to|strong="H5971"\w* ensnare \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H5375"\w* said unto \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \add chastisement\add*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offend|strong="H2254"\w* \add any more\add*:

\w That|strong="H3808"\w* which \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thou \w me|strong="H3254"\w*: if \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w it|strong="H3254"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*?

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* recompence \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* wilt, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* refusest \w it|strong="H3588"\w*? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* choose, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Men|strong="H2450"\w* \w of|strong="H3824"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w* \w will|strong="H3824"\w* say \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*, yea, every \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*:

\w Job|strong="H3808"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*.

Would \w that|strong="H5704"\w* Job \w were|strong="H5921"\w* tried \w unto|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* answering \w like|strong="H5704"\w* wicked men.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w addeth|strong="H3254"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H6588"\w* \w unto|strong="H3254"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w clappeth|strong="H5606"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w multiplieth|strong="H7235"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* words \w against|strong="H5921"\w* God.
